Dear Cantera users, 

I am a PhD student, and I am working on biomass gasif=
ication.
I am new to Cantera, and I would like to receive some advice on ho=
w 
to implement a model able to reproduce the kinetics of some reactions 
o=
ccurring in gasifiers of biomass. These are mostly surface 
reactions, occu=
rring on charcoal surface;

The reactions are the following:

C+2H2<=3D>CH4=

C+CO2<=3D>2CO
CH4+H2O<=3D>CO+3H2
C+H2O<=3D>CO+H2

Is there a m file that I=
 can modify in order to obtain the reaction 
rates for this system?

you for your kind answers.

Lorenzo
